channel.title: Solved: need help with ActionHandler

item.title: Solved: need help with ActionHandler
item.dc:creator: @AustenGreen AustenGreen
item.description:
@AustenGreen wrote:

this is for the falador ladders
the hight level 3 and hight level 1 down ladders in general store

case 11741: if (obX == 2954 && obY == 3389)) { c.getPA().object(3562, 9678, 11741, 0, 1); c.getPA().movePlayer(2954, 3390, 2); } else if (obX == 2954 && obY == 3389) { c.getPA().object(3558, 9677, 11741, 0, -1); c.getPA().movePlayer(2954, 3390, 0); } break;

error is [code]src\server\model\players\ActionHandler.java:1661: error: illegal start of expres
sion
if (obX == 2954 && obY == 3389)) {
^
src\server\model\players\ActionHandler.java:1664: error: ‘else’ without ‘if’
} else if (obX == 2954 && obY == 3389) {
^
2 errors

–Perfect Virtual World Has Completely Finished its Compiling!–

Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

never mind I had one to many )
